remarks: Swap subtrahend and result of vector subtraction.  (Contributed by NM, 14-Dec-2007.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
nvsubsub23.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
nvsubsub23.3 $e |- M = ( -v ` U ) $.
nvsubsub23 $p |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( ( A M B ) = C <-> ( A M C ) = B ) ) $.
